descriptionHtml:
These mods turns Meeko into variant different creatures, so far there are options to turn him into a Flaming Thrall and a White Wolf.

This will not be compatible with anything that edits Meeko. If you are using UFO make sure you load this mod after it.

Installation:
=========================================================================================

Simply download with the NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) and activate it.

Lord order:

UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul.esp
Meeko White Wolf.esp/ Meeko Fire Wolf v1.1.esp

ONLY USE ONE!!


Uninstall:
=========================================================================================

Deactivate with NMM
author: Duckegg45

files.name: Meeko Flaming Thrall
files.changelogHtml:
Removed bleeding from thrall variant.
Added a white wolf variant.
